system.biography: A Lesser Digimon that vigorously grew a tail. As it is brimming with curiosity, it takes an interest in anything, and has a habit of rushing for whatever caught its interest. The inside of its body has become mostly empty, and because it is elastic like a rubber ball, its 'Shippo Swing', in which it puts its strength into its tail and strikes, seems to have the force to blow away even a Child Digimon.

system.description: Kyaromon can bounce as high as it wants, it gains the Fly Movement Type.
system.effect: Kyaromon can bounce as high as it wants, it gains the Fly Movement Type.

system.description: Attacks with Tail in their name and Shippo Swing gain +1 to its Intensity.
system.effect: Attacks with Tail in their name and Shippo Swing gain +1 to its Intensity.

system.description: Kyaromon can spend their movement to bounce around and charge momentum. On its turn, Kyaromon can give up its movement to gain a momentum charge. On its next Melee attack, it gains a number of bonus damage dice equal to its momentum charges. When it uses an attack, reset its charges to 0.
system.effect: Give up movement to gain momentum charge. Gain bonus damage dice equal to charges on next Melee attack. Reset charges after attack.

system.description: A powerful tail swing attack. Surge 1: If the target is a Child Digimon or less you may push it to another zone.
effects: Surge 1: If the target is a Child Digimon or less you may push it to another zone.
